敬请期待:
<size=16>Kunjungi server komunitas.
Translator Plugin: Nakune
Penerjemah: Veda_Raiden</size>
游戏完全免费，点击这里关注作者蓝飘飘fly，获取最新更新动态: Game ini akan selalu gratis————klik di sini untuk mengikuti authornya LanPiaoPiaoFly!
点击这里关注画师机鱼吐司: Klik di sini untuk mengikuti artist Gfishtus!
确定重新开始吗？:
Apakah Kamu yakin?
ingin memulai ulang?
请选择禁用的植物: Silakan pilih tanaman yang akan dinonaktifkan
修改格子只对大地图有效: Modifying the grid is only effective for Large Maps
你可以获得随机1种究极植物\r\n但你将面对更强大的僵尸:
You can get a random ultimate plant
But you will face stronger zombies
通关挑战模式解锁配方: Buka Fusion dengan Menyelesaikan Mode Challenge!
该配方仅旅行模式可用: Fusion ini hanya tersedia dalam Mode Odyssey!
只能融合小喷菇！: Anda hanya dapat gabung dengan Puff-shrooms!
不能在水上融合！: Ini tidak bisa digabung di air!
不能在陆地上融合！: Ini tidak dapat menyatu di darat!
一大波僵尸正在接近！: WASPADALAH! GELOMBANG BESAR ZOMBIE SEDANG MENDEKAT
试试把豌豆种到向日葵上面: Cobalah menanam Kipli di atas Bunga Matahari.
手里拿着植物时可以融合的植物会发光: Tanaman yang memenuhi syarat untuk fusi akan bersinar saat dipegang.
坚果融合后可以回满血哦: Bila Kacang Batu disatukan, mereka akan sembuh hingga mencapai kesehatan penuh.
手套可以自由移动或融合植物: Sarung tangan dapat digunakan untuk memindahkan atau menggabungkan tanaman.
礼盒可开出基础植物，亦可作为任意基础植物进行融合:
Kotak Gacha dapat memunculkan tanaman random.
Kotak hadiah ini juga dapat digunakan sebagai upgrade untuk tanaman fusion.
僵尸掉落的铁桶可以放到豌豆射手和坚果墙上:
Ember yang dijatuhkan oleh zombie 
dapat ditempatkan di Peashooter dan Wall-Nut
高坚果作为紫卡只能放在坚果墙上: Pohon kacang tinggi hanya dapat ditanam di atas pohon kacang dinding yang sudah ada.
一个格子里可以放3个小喷菇:
Anda dapat menumpuk hingga tiga 
Puff-shroom dalam satu kotak.
小秘密：小喷菇+向日葵=阳光菇: Fusion: Jamur puff + Windi = Anak Windi
肥料可用于给植物回血，更多用法自行探索:
Fertilizer can be used to restore plants' Toughness.
There are other uses you can explore.
毁灭大喷菇要手动点击哦: Untuk membuat serangan bom nuklir, Anda perlu mengkliknya jamurnya secara manual.
橄榄帽可以放到高坚果上: Helm Rugbi dapat dipasang di Bapak Kacang.
忧郁菇作为紫卡只能放在大喷菇上: Gloom-shroom hanya dapat ditanam di atas Fume-shroom yang sudah ada.
听说了吗？有的睡莲头上会长植物: Have you heard that Lily Pad have plants growing on their heads?
传说有些僵尸被刺红温了更容易受伤:
Legend has it that some zombies are 
more vulnerable to injury when they are stabbed red.
地刺王作为紫卡只能放在地刺上: Spikerock can only be planted on top of an existing Spikeweed.
猫尾草作为紫卡只能放在睡莲上: Cattail can only be planted on top of an existing Lily Pad.
路灯花会为周围5*5范围格子提供1点光照等级: Plantern provides 1 Lumos Level to the surrounding 5x5 grid.
光系植物随着所在格子的光照等级增加而变强: Lumos plants become stronger as the Lumos Level of the grid they are on increases.
木锤会送一只僵尸归西: The Wooden Hammer can send a zombie towards its doom.
试试将磁力菇吸到的物体放到磁力南瓜或磁力杨桃上: Try placing the objects attracted by the Magnet-shroom onto the Pumpkin Lure or Starpole.
注意到磁力菇边上白色的线了吗，将他们都连起来: Did you notice the white lines next to the Magnet-shroom? Connect them all together.
小心你没见过的僵尸！: Watch out for zombies you haven't seen before!
这一关只能种植或融合小喷菇！: In this level, you can only grow or fuse Puff-shrooms!
击败僵尸以获取阳光: Sun can only be obtained when defeating zombies.
错误：尝试生成不存在的植物！: Error: Attempting to spawn a plant that doesn't exist!
错误：尝试生成不存在的种植预览！: Error: Trying to generate a planting preview that doesn't exist!
已解超级樱桃机枪射手，樱桃机枪+超级樱桃射手: Solved Super Cherry Gatling Pea, Cherry Gatling Pea + Super Cherry Peashooter
已解锁火爆窝炬，火爆窝瓜+窝炬: Unlocked The Hot Squash Torchwood, Hot Squash + Squash Torchwood
已解锁樱桃战神，樱桃大嘴花+超级大嘴花: Unlocked Cherry War God, Cherry Chomper + Super Big Mouth Chomper
此类植物仅特定模式使用: Tanaman ini eksklusif untuk mode tertentu.
解锁究极樱桃机枪，樱桃机枪+超级樱桃射手: Unlock Gatling Cherrybomber: Gatling Cherry + Explodoshooter
解锁究极窝炬，超级火炬+火爆窝瓜: Unlock Squash Infernowood: Pyrewood + Spicy Squash
魅帝召唤间隔减为10秒: The summoning interval of Empress-shroom is reduced to 10 seconds.
魅帝能召唤究极僵尸: Empress-shroom can now summon Ultimate Zombies.
毁灭机枪不再需要休息: Gatling Doom no longer needs to rest.
毁灭机枪每轮都能发射大子弹: Gatling Doom now always shoot bullets of doom every attack interval.
阳光帝果每次都能回满血: Sun Emperor can restore full health every time.
阳光帝果单次受伤降为10点: Sun Emperor's Toughness is reduced by 10 every attack instead.
阳光价值提高一个等级: Increase the Lumos Level by one level.
每回合开始时在每行生成一个魅惑舞王冰车: At the beginning of each round, a Charmed Michael Zomboni is generated in each row.
获得2000阳光，然后使你的阳光翻倍: Gain 2000 Sun, then double the value of subsequent Sun gained.
火焰豌豆类会对僵尸附加红温效果: Ignited peas will now add the Enflamed debuff to zombies.
手套不再有冷却时间: Glove no longer has a cooldown.
冰锥的穿透次数增加到10次: Increased the number of times icicles penetrate by 10 times.
冰锥的对冻结的单位造成伤害提升至10倍: Gatling Icicle-shroom's damage to frozen units are increased by 10 times.
超级杨桃的流星间隔cd减半: Star Emperor's meteor interval CD is halved.
全场默认最高光照等级: Increases the Lumos Level to the max.
激光南瓜的僚机可以对地攻击: <size=10>Laser Pumpkin's wingmen can carry out ground attacks.
黑曜石高坚果受到寒冰菇效果回血10000，火爆辣椒效果回满血: <size=8>Obsidian-nut recovers 10,000 HP when affected by Ice Mushrooms, and recover full HP when affected by Jalapeno.
黑曜石高坚果会代替左右两株植物受伤: Obsidian-nut will take damage instead of the two plants on the left and right.
大幅强化究极樱桃战神的攻击距离: Greatly enhances the attack range of Cherrizilla.
使得究极樱桃战神能免疫一切爆炸: Makes Cherrizilla immune to all explosions.
究极樱桃机枪现在免疫樱桃爆炸: Gatling Cherrybomber is now immune to cherry explosions.
降低究极樱桃机枪的攻击间隔至1秒: Reduced the attack interval of Gatling Cherrybomber to 1 second.
提升究极大喷菇的攻击力至300: Increase the attack power of Ultima-shroom to 300.
提升究极大喷菇的冻结速度为3倍: Increase the freezing speed of Ultima-shroom to 3 times.
降低究极窝炬生成窝瓜需要的子弹数至10: Reduced the number of bullets required to spawn a Spicy Squash for Squash Infernowood to 10.
究极窝炬每次可以生成两个窝瓜: Squash Infernowood can generate two Spicy Squash at a time.
降低究极杨桃个攻击间隔至0.5秒: Reduced the attack interval of Star Emperor to 0.5 seconds.
究极杨桃的子弹攻击力不再有上限: The attack power of Star Emperor's bullets no longer has an upper limit.
究极忧郁菇亡语伤害增加到1000000: Increase Ultima-shroom's damage upon death to 1,000,000.
究极忧郁菇现在会吸收爆炸伤害然后把爆炸能量释放出来: Ultima-shroom now absorbs explosion damage and reflects it back to the enemies.
